cova.rules

Interface IRule<M,N,A>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaintConstraintCreationRule, TaintPropagationRule, UIConstraintCreationRule

    public interface IRule<M,N,A>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      A callEntryFlowFunction(Context<M,N,A> context, M callee, N node, N succ, A in)
      Processes the inter-procedural flow function for a method call at the start of the call, to handle parameters.
      A callExitFlowFunction(Context<M,N,A> context, M callee, N node, N succ, A exitValue)
      Processes the inter-procedural flow function for a method call at the end of the call, to handle return values.
      A callLocalFlowFunction(Context<M,N,A> context, N node, N succ, A in)
      Processes the intra-procedural flow function for a method call at the call-site itself, to handle propagation of local values that are not involved in the call.
      A normalFlowFunction(Context<M,N,A> context, N node, N succ, A in)
      Processes the intra-procedural flow function of a statement that does not contain a method call.

    • Method Detail

      • normalFlowFunction

        A normalFlowFunction(Context<M,N,A> context,
                     N node,
                     N succ,
                     A in)
        Processes the intra-procedural flow function of a statement that does not contain a method call.
        Parameters:
        context - the value context at the call-site
        node - the statement whose flow function to process
        succ - the succ
        in - the data flow value before the statement
        Returns:
        the data flow value after the statement

      • callEntryFlowFunction

        A callEntryFlowFunction(Context<M,N,A> context,
                        M callee,
                        N node,
                        N succ,
                        A in)
        Processes the inter-procedural flow function for a method call at the start of the call, to handle parameters.
        Parameters:
        context - the value context at the call-site
        callee - the target (or one of the targets) of this call site
        node - the statement containing the method call
        succ - the succ
        in - the data flow value before the call
        Returns:
        the data flow value at the entry to the called procedure

      • callExitFlowFunction

        A callExitFlowFunction(Context<M,N,A> context,
                       M callee,
                       N node,
                       N succ,
                       A exitValue)
        Processes the inter-procedural flow function for a method call at the end of the call, to handle return values.
        Parameters:
        context - the value context at the call-site
        callee - the target (or one of the targets) of this call site
        node - the statement containing the method call
        succ - the succ
        exitValue - the data flow value at the exit of the called procedure
        Returns:
        the data flow value after the call (returned component)

      • callLocalFlowFunction

        A callLocalFlowFunction(Context<M,N,A> context,
                        N node,
                        N succ,
                        A in)
        Processes the intra-procedural flow function for a method call at the call-site itself, to handle propagation of local values that are not involved in the call.
        Parameters:
        context - the value context at the call-site
        node - the statement containing the method call
        succ - the succ
        in - the data flow value before the call
        Returns:
        the data flow value after the call (local component)
